targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE  "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("write_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),"cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_listen") FROM "netstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_none") FROM "netstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_time_wait") FROM "netstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("udp_socket") FROM "netstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_syn_recv") FROM "netstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_syn_sent") FROM "netstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) ,"device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("bytes_recv") FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("bytes_sent") FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: 主机
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"
